summary: The story of the 1973 hockey season when aging legend Gordie Howe returned to the ice at the age of 44.
cast: Michael Shanks|Kathleen Robertson|Martin Cummins|Dylan Playfair|Andrew Herr|Emma Grabinsky|Ali Tataryn|Andrew Kavadas|Teach Grant|Lochlyn Munro|Donnelly Rhodes|Graham Mayes|Paul Magel|Karl Thordarson|Brad Turner|Adam Hurtig|Erik Berg|Bryan Clark|Brock Couch|Gio Tropea|Tom Anniko|John B. Lowe|Curt Keilback|Curtis Moore|Ernie Pitts|Candace Smith|James Juce|Adam Brooks|R.J. Adams|Darren Felbel|Grayson Maxwell Gurnsey|Jacob Klick|William O'Donnell|Gordon Tanner|Jim Kirby|Marjorie Roden|Karen Tusa
title: Mr. Hockey: The Gordie Howe Story
